description.name: wbtcoptimism
description.tagline: Wrapped BTC optimism Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto optimism-wbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped BTC optimism directly on your website
Unique optimism/wbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your optimism/wbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
